name: WSJ
text: Disney is selling cloth masks depicting characters such as Mickey Mouse. But at least one Etsy entrepreneur filled a niche the media giant missed. https://t.co/Ed0FHYI0ba

name: WSJ
text: The U.S. budget deficit reached $3 trillion in the 12 months through June as stimulus spending soared and tax revenue plunged (Corrects an earlier tweet, which has been deleted, that said the deficit surpassed $3 trillion) https://t.co/vPrZCY8HdE https://t.co/wLCo7Khex6

name: WSJ
text: As U.S. officials consider punishing China over its recent security law in Hong Kong, the city’s status as a global financial center limits the menu of effective levers available to Washington https://t.co/gIylSdqOzG

name: WSJ
text: Joe Biden is searching for a national middle ground on economic policy, taking a bit from Bill Clinton, a bit from Barack Obama, a bit from Donald Trump and a bit from his party’s resurgent left, writes @GeraldFSeib  https://t.co/6msrN1a6Pe

name: WSJ
text: China has leapfrogged much of the Western world in cashless transactions and 5G tech. But companies remain wedded to the millennia-old ink stamp to conduct business. https://t.co/0qRENZ4oQC

name: WSJ
text: A growing list of M.B.A. programs plan to extend their GMAT-optional format to the 2021 admissions cycle, citing challenges students continue to face despite exams moving online https://t.co/FIab239v8x

name: WSJ
text: The EU will take coordinated action to respond to China’s tightening grip on Hong Kong, including looking at export bans for sensitive technologies, widening visa possibilities for the island’s citizens and reconsidering extradition arrangements https://t.co/zYgmSXOygS

name: WSJ
text: From @WSJopinion: Much of the press’s power to influence U.S. public opinion came from its politically neutrality, pioneered by James Gordon Bennett’s New York Herald, writes @SteeleGordon https://t.co/E64cvD1iap

name: WSJ
text: A video shows NYPD police officers pushing and tackling a Black protester before tasing and arresting him. The police officer’s use of the Taser gun is under investigation, according to the New York City mayor. https://t.co/dWuts4f0dd
